title: BYD Crosses Above Key Moving Average Level - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Wednesday, shares of Boyd Gaming Corp. (Symbol: BYD) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $26.20, changing hands as high as $26.40 per share. Boyd Gaming Corp. shares are currently trading up about 3.1% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BYD shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, BYD's low point in its 52 week range is $18.98 per share, with $34.79 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $26.32.
